name: Canto Crabs Chip
description: CRAB is the token for the Canto Crabs Ecosystem. This token can be used in Crab yield farms, staked to earn NFTs, as well as distributed as casino revenue share. CRAB is designed to utilize deflationary mechanics such as burning. It is integrated into the Canto Crabs Roulette wheel. It is required in order to play the game and gets burnt upon every bet placed. The token can be paired together with CANTO and staked in the Crab Farms for the purposes of yield farming.
